extendedInfo.description: The insanely popular iPhone app comes to Android...finally! Do you suspect someone is cheating on you? Do you want to bust âem in the act?  If youâve got that nagging feeling that your partner may be cheating on you...start your surveillance today and donât be a victim any longer!Easy to follow Step-by-Step Checklists teach you how to get evidence of your partner's infidelity and bust them in the act!The Spy Guide now comes with software to let you... * Spy on Text Messages * Spy on Email Accounts * Spy on Computers * Learn how to Find Hidden Passwords * How to Spy on Cell Phone Records * How to Recover Deleted Data from Cell Phones * Learn how to use the Web to Catch a Cheater * How to Follow a Cheater on the Internet * Spy on an Online Relationship * Find Instant Messages and chat history in PC (even if it's been deleted)* How to do a Reverse Phone # Search * How to do a People Search * How to Secretly Install Spyware on PC * How to Secretly Install Spyware on Cell* What are Keyloggers?* How and where to get FREE Keylogger software* GPS Tracking Overview * Make a GPS Device from an Old Cell******PLUS MUCH MORE!******* Featured in FLARE Magazine, Canada's #1 magazine for fashion and current culture!Featured in the Huffington Post, as the #2 creepiest app in the market today!NOW FREE CELL SPY SOFTWARE NOW INCLUDED!! AS OF 11/5 APP HAS BEEN UPDATED AND COMPLETELY REDESIGNED...NOT JUST INFO ANYMORE!Â Tags: spy, spy app, catch cheating spouse, spy on spouse, spy on kids, spouse, text, texting, spouse text, cheating spouse text, cheating spouse, cheating girlfriend, cheating boyfriend, cheating husband, cheating wife, cheating fiance, text app, cheating text, cheating, read text, snatch text

reviews.title: Thumbs Up!
reviews.comment: Great app! It has all the features as described and all works well..Especially loved the GPS tracking feature..Definitely worth buying!!:-)
reviews.author: Hasan Kagalwala

reviews.title: Very Useful!
reviews.comment: A wonderful app with so many multiple features..Its one of a kind and love it..Now i can keep an eye on my husband on what he does and whom he talks to on my droid..Credit to the developers!
reviews.author: TM K

reviews.comment: What\'s the use in spying if you have to have consent to put this on the other user\'s phone. That kind of defeats the purpose. I want something where I can spy without having to get the consent to put something on their phone...that\'s not going to happen. Would like a refund and am uninstalling.
reviews.author: Traci Morton

reviews.title: Waste of time and money.
reviews.comment: I bought this app because it says it\'s specifically for android and u can see deleted messages. But after reading through so much I find out that the one reason I bought it for is not available for android?!?! Waste of time and money.
reviews.author: Christina Robinson

reviews.title: Scam! Stupid
reviews.comment: Hello, bought it and now in order to set up the software I need to go to a link and download a free version of some software( which the seller of this app says they are partners) then if I want to get full feautures I would need to buy the full version which is $15! The app on its own is just a stupid collection of advises on how to catch your cheating spouse, I WANT MY MONEY BACK Gooogle should have you banned from play store I will have my attorney look into the details to see if it can be logged as fraud
reviews.author: Achillis Achillis

reviews.comment: I wasn\'t given what was promised. They beat around the bush instead of giving you what you paid for.if i pay for something i want it how you described it and not have to do more just to receive what i paid for.I\'m not reading paragraph after paragraph on how to catch somebody cheating and go to another website and etc i want what you said ill get. if theirs more to our payment Tell Us Before We Pay thank you Please respond back about my refund
